title: Berlin: City Sightseeing Hop-On Hop-Off Bus Tour
meeting_point: Download the 'City Sightseeing Berlin' app to check the latest times and see a list of the stop locations. The tour can be started from any of the bus stops along the route

title: Berlin: Sachsenhausen Concentration Camp and Potsdam Tour
meeting_point: Your guide will be waiting next to the World Time Clock at Alexandreplatz. They will be wearing their Buendía accreditation.

title: GDR Adventure Tour with Nuclear Bunker, Lunch & Pub Visit
meeting_point: Open in Google Maps

title: Reichstag, Dome and Government District Guided Tour
meeting_point: Meet at the intersection of Paul-Löbe-Allee and Konrad-Adenauer-Straße, next to the subway exit Bundestag (U5) exit D in front of the elevator.

title: Berlin: Third Reich & Cold War 2 hour Guided Walking Tour
meeting_point: Meet in front of the tourist information point at Brandenburg Gate, Pariser Platz 1. Look for a guide with the pink umbrella at the Brandenburg Gate. The closest public transportation is the S-Bahn and U-Bahn station Brandenburger Tor (S1, S2, S25, S26 and U5) or buses 100 and 245.

title: Berlin: Sachsenhausen Concentration Camp Tour in English
meeting_point: Meet your guide outside the Friedrichstraße train station on the square beside the '"Traenenpalast" (Palace of Tears) to begin the tour. Look for the guides holding the yellow umbrellas.

title: Berlin: 1-Hour City Tour by Boat with Guaranteed Seating
meeting_point: The meeting point is on the corner of Friedrichstraße and Am Weidendamm, a 5-minute walk from Friedrichstraße S- and U-bahn station. Please wait at the Stern und Kreisschiffahrt sign.

title: Berlin: Sachsenhausen Concentration Camp Memorial Tour
meeting_point: Your guide will be waiting next to the World Time Clock at Alexandreplatz. They will be wearing their Buendía accreditation.

title: Brandenburg: Tropical Islands Resort Day Ticket
meeting_point: Open in Google Maps

title: Berlin: TV Tower Standard Entrance Ticket
meeting_point: Please make your way directly to the security control point on the first floor of the TV Tower. The steps leading up to the entrance are located on the tower's northern side, directly opposite the Alexanderplatz S-Bahn (rail) station.

title: Berlin: Subway/U-Bahn Photoshoot with a Local Photographer
meeting_point: Open in Google Maps

title: Berlin: Big Bus Hop-On Hop-Off Sightseeing Tour & Currywurst
meeting_point: You can activate your ticket in one of two ways: 1. Download the Big Bus app and use your Activity Provider Reference Number on this voucher to add your booking and activate your ticket when you are ready to travel. You can then board the bus at any Big Bus stop on the route. 2. Present your printed or mobile voucher with a Big Bus team member at any stop on the route during operating hours. A recommended boarding point is Big Bus Stop 1 located at Alexanderstraße 3-5, 10178 Berlin (Opposite Park Inn Hotel). Both the red and blue routes depart from this stop. Your ticket includes a free currywurst and a free souvenir bag. Simply show your booking to a Big Bus staff member at any stop to receive a printed vouchers, which you can then use to collect both your currywurst and your souvenir bag.

title: Berlin: Highest Swing in Europe
meeting_point: Please enter the lift and follow the signs to "High Swing".

title: Berlin: 75-minute Trabi Safari
meeting_point: TrabiWorld, Zimmerstraße 97-100, at the corner of Wilhelmstraße.

title: Interactive DeJa Vu Museum Entrance Ticket
meeting_point: The entrance to the museum is right by Alexanderplatz, roughly 300-meters from Fernsehturm.

title: Berlin: Third Reich, Hitler, and WWII Walking Tour
meeting_point: You’ll find our guides outside the Friedrichstraße train station, on the square between the Tränenpalast (Palace of Tears) and the station. The guides will be wearing a blue lanyard and a yellow name tag holding yellow umbrellas

title: Berlin: English Bus Tour to Sachsenhausen Concentration Camp
meeting_point: Find your guide outside Friedrichstraße train station, on the square between the Tränenpalast (Palace of Tears) and the station. The guides will be wearing a blue lanyard and a yellow name tag holding yellow umbrellas.

title: Berlin: Pub Crawl & Party with Free Shots & VIP Club Access
meeting_point: Meeting point may vary depending on the option booked.

title: Icebar Entrance with Complimentary Drinks
meeting_point: Meet at the ice bar 10 minutes before your reserved time slot. This Berlin Ice bar is at Spandauer Straße 2, next to Alexanderplatz

title: Berlin WelcomeCard: Discounts & Transport Berlin Zones (ABC)
meeting_point: After booking your WelcomeCard, you will receive an email with your ticket for public transportation across the entire city and a guide. To receive discounts at the sights included in the card, present your ticket and guide directly at the attraction.

title: Berlin: Discover Berlin Walking Tour
meeting_point: Meeting point may vary depending on the option booked.

title: Berlin: Pub Crawl with Shots and VIP Club Entry
meeting_point: Meet your guide at 21:00 at Generator Berlin Alexanderplatz, Otto-Braun-Straße 65, 10178 Berlin

title: Bubble Planet: An Experience Museum for All Your Senses
meeting_point: Open in Google Maps

title: Berlin Story Bunker Entry Ticket
meeting_point: The meeting point is the ticket office of the Berlin Story Bunker, Schöneberger Str. 23a, 10963 Berlin.

title: Berlin: Government District Tour and Reichstag Dome Visit
meeting_point: Meeting point: In front of the Bundestag subway station, Exit B: Otto-von-Bismarck-Allee Google Maps: https://maps.app.goo.gl/H8pnuB7H3FfJ2xSa7 Info: Subway line U5 (Bundestag stop). The guide will be holding a "TOUR" sign. He will be waiting in front of Exit B (not inside the station). Note: We do not meet in front of the Reichstag building. We will reach the Reichstag entrance approximately 45 minutes after the tour through the government district. Please come to the meeting point.

title: Berlin: BLINDED by DELIGHT Grand Show Friedrichstadt-Palast
meeting_point: N/A

title: Berlin: "Flying Lights" - incl. Flying Steps – Variety Show
meeting_point: N/A

title: Berlin: Hop-on Hop-off Bus Tour with Live Commentary
meeting_point: You can start your tour from any of the stops on the route: 01 - Kurfürstendamm 231 (in front of Galeria); 02 - KaDeWe main entrance; 03 - Lützowplatz (an der Bushaltestelle); 04 – Philharmonic (an der Bushaltestelle); 05 - Potsdamer Platz (at Kolhoff Tower); 06 - Potsdamer Platz / Linkstraße; 07 - Topography of Terror; 08 - Checkpoint Charlie Wall Museum; 09 - Gendarmenmarkt, Markgrafenstr.; 10 - Alexanderplatz, TV Tower, Spandauer Str., between Red City Hall & Neptunbrunnen ; 11 - Karl-Liebknecht Str. 5 (to the boat); 12 – Museumsinsel / Humboldtforum; 13 - Unter den Linden 10 . Bud Spencer Museum; 14 - Unter den Linden 36 / Friedrichstraße; 15 - Unter den Linden 74, Madame Tussauds Berlin; 16 - Brandenburg Gate, Ebertstraße; 17 - Reichstag, Scheidemannstr; 18 - Hauptbahnhof, exit Washington Place; 19 - Haus der Kulturen der Welt (out of order); 20 - Bellevue Palace; 21 - Bikini Haus, Budapester Straße; 22 - U&S-Bahn station Zoologischer Garten.

title: Madame Tussauds Admission Ticket
meeting_point: Madame Tussauds, Unter den Linden 74, 10117 Berlin

title: Museum Island Multiple Museum Entry Ticket
meeting_point: Please go to the entrance of the museum in Museumsinsel Berlin.

title: DARK MATTER Experience KOLLEKTION Entry Ticket
meeting_point: Enter DARK MATTER to begin your experience.

title: Best Berlin Shore Excursion from Warnemunde or Rostock Port
languages: English, Spanish, French, German, Portuguese, Chinese, Italian, Hebrew, Russian
meeting_point: Meet at Warnemünde/Rostock Cruise Ship Port. When you disembark from your cruise ship, please make your way outside to the terminal entrance. A representative will be waiting for you displaying a greeting sign that says "Vexperio".

title: Illuseum Berlin Entrance Ticket
meeting_point: The entrance of the museum at Illuseum Berlin, Karl-Liebknecht-Str. 9, 10178 Berlin

title: Charlottenburg Palace Entry Ticket
meeting_point: Please go to the entrance of Charlottenburg Palace at the time indicated on your ticket. For all other palaces included, you can visit during the day of your booking. To visit the New Pavilion please go to Charlottenburg Palace New Wing or Old Palace to get a ticket with an entrance time.

title: Berlin Highlights: 3-Hour Bike Tour
meeting_point: Fat Tire Tours Office at the base of the giant TV Tower (Fernsehturm) in Berlin's Alexanderplatz. The office is marked with Fat Tire Tours signs and flags.

title: Legoland Discovery Centre Entry Ticket
meeting_point: Please present your printed ticket or your ticket on a mobile device at the entrance of the attraction. Look out for the giant LEGO giraffe. Please arrive within your selected time slot/date.

title: Berlin Dungeon: Entrance Ticket
meeting_point: Meeting point may vary depending on the option booked.

title: David Bowie & 1970s Berlin Guided Walking Tour
meeting_point: Ständige Vertretung, a memorabilia-filled cafe. Address: Schiffbauerdamm 8, 10117 Berlin.

title: Ticket for World Balloon with Perfect View
meeting_point: Meet at Шар Welt (world map/globe) near Checkpoint Charlie.

title: Olympia Stadium Entrance Ticket
meeting_point: Please come to the visitor centre.

title: Berlin: Reichstag, Plenary Chamber, Cupola & Government Tour
meeting_point: At the ARD studio, Wilhelmstraße 67 A (on the corner of Reichstagufer), next to the Marschallbrücke

title: Berlin: City Street Art Guided Walking Tour

title: Berlin: Sights and Highlights Bike Tour with a Local Guide

title: Berlin: Dinner Cruise on the Spree with Prosecco

title: Sanssouci Palace and Prussian Palaces Entry Ticket
meeting_point: Entrance is via the Ehrenhof of Sanssouci Palace. Please enter Sanssouci Palace at the admission time indicated on your ticket.
